views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

Compatible with iOS 8 to 13

Anilaunch is a tweak which will make your icons animate on various actions.

Personalize your device even more by adding animations to your app icons on app launch or close, on shake device, on swipe springboard pages, on rotate device or by just simply touching the icon that you want to animate. You can choose from many different predefined animations and adjust the animations duration precisely for your needs. And if you canâ€™t decide which animation to choose then just use the random function to get a different animation every time.

Additionally, with Per App animations it is even possible to animate just the individual icons or folders that you want.


Works on all iOS devices with iOS 8.0+.

Configure options from Settings app

Added iOS13 support - Added iOS 12 compatibility
- Fixed some minor bugs
- Removed AppList dependency

- Added full iOS11 support
- Fixed some minor bugs
- Added full iOS10.2 support
- Fixed some bugs
- Fixed a small issue - Fixed an issue where icons would not return to their default position when run or hop animations are used and reduce motion is enabled
- Improved preferences
- Fixed a small issue in the preferences
- Fixed an issues that may have cause a crash at some circumstances

- Added the possibility to play a sound when the animation starts
- Launch animation can now be disabled without disabling the tweak
- Fixed some minor bugs

- Fixed a crash that may occur when opening the preferences
